short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts the image ID from a Woost image URL. Useful for finding the original image in the Woost admin panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Woost Image ID Extractor is a handy Chrome extension that simplifies the process of extracting image IDs from websites created with the Woost framework. Itâ€™s an essential tool for developers and administrators who need to quickly locate original images within the Woost admin panel. How to Use: 1) Activate the Extension: Click on the Woost Image ID Extractor icon in the Chrome toolbar. The icon will turn green, indicating that the extension is active. 2) Select an Image: Browse the website you are interested in. Once the extension is activated, simply click on any image on the current webpage. 3) Copy to Clipboard: The extension automatically extracts the image's ID and copies it to your clipboard. 4) Find in Woost Admin Panel: Use the copied ID to effortlessly locate the original image in the Woost admin panel. Features: - Intuitive and easy-to-use interface. - Efficiently extracts image IDs with just a click. - Supports both elements and background images. - Automatically copies extracted IDs to the clipboard for easy pasting. - Woost Image ID Extractor streamlines your workflow, saving you time and effort in managing images on websites built with Woost. Try it today and enhance your Woost experience! Officially associated with Woost. Please feel free to share your feedback and suggestions to help us improve this tool.
